channel.title: Okta Integration Network (OIN) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Okta Integration Network (OIN) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: An introduction to the OIN, what it is, what an integration is, different types of integration in the OIN, differences between OIN Manager and OIN Wizard, why publish to the OIN at all? Lists reasons why people / ISVs should care about publishing on the OIN in the first place.

item.title: Integrations you should build
item.description: Integrations you should build to enter the market Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: Discuss with Jeff content. Original title was “What integrations should I build to enter the market?” Why is this here?: Requested by product management. Page type: Concept Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews.

item.title: Best practices for OIN apps
item.description: Best practices for OIN apps Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: OIN best practices. Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Best security practices for the app specific guidelines for each app Internal Workshop: When asked “What prevents devs from being successful on the OIN, respondents answered:

item.title: Use cases for OIN integrations
item.description: Use cases Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Docs on use case scenarios Use cases Use case flows Use cases were consistently the most sought after docs
